import axios from 'axios' import { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { Context } from '../../context/Context' import './write.css' const Write = () => { const [title, setTitle] = useState('') const [desc, setDesc] = useState('') const [file, setFile] = useState(null) const { user } = useContext(Context) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const newPosts = { username: user.username, title, desc } if (file) { const data = FormData() const filename = Date.now() + file.name data.append('name', filename) data.append('file', file) } axios.post('/posts') } return (
) } export default Write
